title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Foundational Augmented Reality (AR) Applications for Advanced STEM Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone operation skills and general understanding of STEM fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can visualize abstract concepts in STEM fields (science/engineering) as 3D models using AR technology.
Learners can complete virtual experimental procedures combined with real environments through smartphone-based AR applications.
Participants can design STEM learning scenarios applying AR through project-based assessments and present implementation results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
